title: Fragmentary Relief
description:
One limestone relief with two registers partially preserved. Above, in sunk relief are representations of three figures, perhaps dancing, preserved from the feet to their lower abdomens. It is suggested that this may be  jubilation scene greeting the return of the master. Below, floral motifs. All in sunk relief. 

Condition: The surface is pitted; the floral motifs in the second register almost invisible.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
